title: Chicken Gravy
description: A hearty and flavorful curry that's a warm embrace for your taste buds.
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.
Add chicken and cook until it changes color.
Add tomato puree, yogurt, and spices. Cook until oil separates.
Add water, cover, and simmer until chicken is tender.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve.

title: Butter Chicken
description: Creamy, rich, and indulgent, this curry is a true culinary masterpiece.
steps: Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions until translucent.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.
Add chicken and cook until it changes color.
Add tomato puree, cream, and spices. Simmer until the sauce thickens.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Silken cubes of paneer swimming in a velvety tomato and buttery delight.
steps: Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions until translucent.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.
Add paneer and cook for a few minutes.
Add tomato puree, cream, and spices. Simmer until the sauce thickens.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve.

title: Malai Kofta
description: Melt-in-your-mouth koftas in a luscious gravy, a vegetarian dream come true.
steps: Mix paneer, mashed potatoes, cornflour, and salt. Shape into balls and fry until golden brown.
Heat butter in a pan and sauté onions until translucent.
Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.
Add tomato puree, cream, and spices. Simmer until the sauce thickens.
Add the fried kofta balls and simmer for a few minutes.
Garnish with coriander leaves and serve.
